pages.text: Appears in:$(li)DX Hiden Zero-One Driver Limited Red Version (2020, toyline)$(br2)Used to craft Ragnarok's $(l:zero_one/devices/ragnarok_driver)Ragnarok Driver$(/l)$(br2)Used to access Zero-One's $(l:zero_one/riders/zero_one#red_rising_hopper)Red Rising Hopper$(/l) form
Obtained by using $(l:zero_one/items/blank_progrisekey)Blank Progrisekeys$(/l) on the $(l:misc/blocks/hiden_3d_printer)HIDEN 3D Printer$(/l)
